mapper.insert: INSERT INTO main_image ( image_id, org_img_nm, save_img_nm, ext, img_size, reg_dt ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')||'-'||to_char(MAIN_IMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FM0000'), #{orgImgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveImgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgSize,javaType=long}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT image_id as imageId, org_img_nm as orgImgNm, save_img_nm saveImgNm, ext, img_size as imgSize FROM main_image ORDER BY image_id
